body_html: An easier workaround would be if INFO_SUPPORTED_HARDWARE_LEVEL_LEGACY is detected, just use the Y (luminance) plane. It can be mapped directly into RGB grayscale values. Detection quality might suffer a small amount (so a toast/log message would be warranted), but at least it wouldn't crash.

body: An easier workaround would be if INFO_SUPPORTED_HARDWARE_LEVEL_LEGACY is detected, just use the Y (luminance) plane. It can be mapped directly into RGB grayscale values. Detection quality might suffer a small amount (so a toast/log message would be warranted), but at least it wouldn't crash.
